text:
thredUP.com | SF | Remote | Ukraine | Full Time

About thredUP thredUP is the largest online marketplace for secondhand clothing. We make buying and selling a cinch for millions of women across the globe. The company resells more than 35,000 brands across hundreds of categories at up to 90% off the original retail value. Headquartered in downtown San Francisco and backed by world-class investors, thredUP is reinventing the secondhand clothing industry and inspiring a new generation of consumers to think secondhand first. Learn more about our culture and values here: https://www.thredup.com/p/careers

Contact: julia.boyle@thredUP.com & tarry.chung@thredUP.com

Here are our top positions right now:
